title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.10 - Pending protests and remit proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2108.10 - Pending protests and remit proceedings

State Regulations

Where a provision of these regulations are amended or an
applicable statute is enacted or amended during the pendency of a protest or a
proceeding remitted by a court after judicial review, the determination shall
be in accordance with the statute or regulation as it existed at the time the
rent administrator's order was issued, unless the relevant law or regulation
states otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2108.10

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
